He often uses it for casual outings or to show off his school spirit. Bold Design: The bright red color and the University of Houston logo really stand out. It’s a great way to represent the UH Cougars! Durable Quality: After several washes, the shirt still looks great. The color hasn’t faded, and the print remains intact. Cons: None! This shirt is everything we hoped for. Final Thoughts: If you’re looking for a stylish and comfortable way to support the University of Houston, this shirt is perfect. My son loves wearing it and showing his school pride. Highly recommended for any UH fan!
